div.div:
We have answers to your questions about your visa, including how to maintain your F-1 status, how to change from another visa status, what to do if you need to travel outside the U.S., and how to reinstate your F-1 status if you loose it. We also have answers for your questions regarding OPT, CPT and other related employment issues. more
For immigration questions, please email us to dranes@hal.Central.edu

We will arrange temporary housing for new (incoming first-time or transfer students).more
For transportation and housing questions, please email us to nan.nelson@central.edu

Campus Shuttle:We arrange pickups to and from the library and your residence. more
Airport Pickup:We will come and receive you at Houston or San Antonio airports or from Greyhound bus stations. There is no charge for this service for new (incoming first-time or transfer students). more
